mapper.select: select * from cs_asset where userid = #{userId} and status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into cs_linkman (id, name, mobile, email, company, address, userId) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{company}, #{address}, #{userId})

insert into cs_order (id, type, begin_date, end_date, serviceId, create_date, task_date, scan_type, userId, contactId, remarks, status, websoc) values(#{id}, #{type}, #{begin_date}, #{end_date}, #{serviceId}, #{create_date}, #{task_date}, #{scan_type}, #{userId}, #{contactId}, #{remarks}, #{status}, #{websoc})
